# tsExtremes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The package tsExtremes aims to compile functions for assessing the time dependencies of extremes.

## Installation

<!-- You can install the released version of tsExtremes from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with: -->

``` r

```
